column1: The E150 is a nice family van to go on long trips  It is also nice to drive around except for the fact that it is about the size of a semi  It gets bad gas mileage because our has a 5 8 liter engine but it has very good power for being as big as it is  It is also very comfortable in the front and back and for kids can be very enjoyable since their is tv and vcr plus any game consoles they want  The only thing I had a problem with was when I was getting off the freeway and I took the turn at 45 mph and the tire ripped off the axle causing it to break the running boards and me to do a 360 degree turn  If you live somewhere where it snows a lot this is not very good in the snow and I added a lot of weight in the back and it still wasn t
